blog.title: everything else just melts away
blog.description: "all the elements in your body were forged many, many millions of years ago in the heart of a far away star that explosed and died. that explosion scattered those elements across the desolations of deep space, until, eventually, they came together to make you. you are unique in the universe." - doctor who. marie; taurus, istj. blarke is my core, olicity trash, bitter queen. love girls on tv, pro-girls unity. atla/tlok hoe. waiting for the doctor. samwise gamgee saved middle earth. daensa is endgame, & sansa and dany are both queens ; protect the dragons (and the direwolves). sam winchester and jack kline are the softest. korra is bae. thor is the strongest avenger. mcu/dc(tv), lotr, got, spn. [ship and let ship]

tags: guess what color are her costumes on s8????
(btw i'm literally rn watching a video where the person quotes michelle clapton saying that)
summary: Wow I can’t believe Michelle Clapton actually confirmed that Daenerys saving Jon and the North Squad on 7x06 was a pure,...
body: Wow I can’t believe Michelle Clapton actually confirmed that Daenerys saving Jon and the North Squad on 7x06 was a pure, uninterested move and that she had technically NO LOGICAL (political) REASON to do so, but she did because of the goodness of her heart. Can’t believe Clapton wanted to transcribe that so much that she chose to dress Daenerys in white, to symbolize her selfless sacrifice.

reblog.comment: Wow I can’t believe Michelle Clapton actually confirmed that Daenerys saving Jon and the North Squad on 7x06 was a pure, uninterested move and that she had technically NO LOGICAL (political) REASON to do so, but she did because of the goodness of her heart. Can’t believe Clapton wanted to transcribe that so much that she chose to dress Daenerys in white, to symbolize her selfless sacrifice.

summary: Why will Dany be so fragile after learning the truth? Is it because Jon will claim that he should be king and she has no right...
question: Why will Dany be so fragile after learning the truth? Is it because Jon will claim that he should be king and she has no right to it? I cant see any other reason for her to feel fragile.
answer:
Hmm. But if that were the issue then Jon would hardly be “her only safety left.” Instead he would be the cause of it. So I don’t think that is indicated.

One possibility is that being the “only Targaryen” and the legitimate heir etc. who has to remove the “usrpers” and take back what is her’s by right, has been believed by her for so long it has become a part of her identity. Now suddenly, it is not her’s by right. She may conquer it, but this is not what she believed she was doing. It was not her justification. If the man who is supposed to have it by traditional right is not even interested in it (as may be the case) then what the hell has she done all this for? She has believed for the longest time that it was her duty and destiny to restore her House because she’s the last left. But she is not the last left. Technically its not even her duty and responsibility at this point but someone else’s before her. Then what the hell has she been doing? Why has she been doing this? Even when she had her dreams that helped her hatch her dragons, her magical abilities that have helped her do so much, she has been telling herself that it is because it is her mission to restore her House. That these things have happened to her for this reason. And how does she know it is her mission? Because she’s the last and only Targaryen left. Well that explanation is out of the window now. So this can be very confusing for her in terms of self-definition. And Jon does not have to do anything about it. I mean even if he tells her that she’s worked for it so she can have the throne etc., it doesn’t take away the problem that the very central assumption that so much of her arc was based on has just been taken away.

An alternate possibility is the incest angle, however. All of a sudden you’re told that the man you love so much (shown easily by how much she’s done for him) and who has given you the love and feeling of “home” you’ve searched for your entire life has become forbidden to you. And through reasons that you can do nothing about. This is not some problem to conquer like Slavers, or Khals, or Cersei. He’s related and that’s that. Suddenly it seems that he has been torn out of her arms. 

So maybe that’s it. I mean Jon probably needs a lot of emotional support here too. His entire identity has been taken away from him. And she probably wants to provide it. But the most natural way for her to provide it is forbidden to her now. So maybe we will get some extremely angsty scenes with them trying to support each other and yet trying not to come too close or give in. 

Ideas anyone?

tags: i wrote this in a spur of a moment
summary:
there was once a boy who loved. no. stop.
start over.
there was once a girl who dreamed of bigger and brighter things and isn’t...
body:
there was once a boy who loved. no. stop.

start over.

there was once a girl who dreamed of bigger and brighter things and isn’t that how every story goes?

but here it is:

in the midst of summer, the sun shines brightly among the clear blue skies. lush green trees surround the cool lake, waves rippling across.

two girls sit on a rickety wooden bench in the warm sun, bodies barely brushing each other. red hair spills forth down her back, eyes squinting against the vivid landscape as she tosses a pebble ahead.

the pebbles barely skips and the girl with the hair of platinum blonde hair laughs and laughs.

in another world, [she] dany was the mother of dragons, and held onto [her] sansa - the wolf who had valiantly united them.

in this world, they are same and so very different with years of friendship, nostalgia, and love between them.

sansa smiles with a quirk of her lips, delighted by her laughter as her fingers brush against dany’s in the next moment.

in every world, there’s a sansa and a dany in love.

photo: https://pin.it/466vz6ajahsxjg

Rebecca & Rosalie | Characters | Pinterest
